DOC.HEADLINE: O.C. COMPUTER FIRMS ENTER MULTIMEDIA
DOC.TEXT: Multimedia computers are in_vogue for computer manufacturers looking_to boost revenues . On Monday , two Orange County computer makers launched low-priced PCs that can run multimedia software , which combines text , audio , video and graphics in a single presentation . Advanced Logic Research Inc. in Irvine said it will sell its Multimedia Express computer for $ 1 # 995 . Meanwhile , Canon Computer_Systems Inc. in Costa Mesa said it has launched its Innova Vision multimedia desktop_computer as well as six other computer models . Both companies say their machines sport the latest in multimedia equipment , including speakers , CD-ROM_drives , monitors and sound cards . The Innova Vision will sell for an estimated $ 1 # 850 to $ 1 # 950 . Consumers have been buying machines with the extra multimedia components in about half of their new PC purchases now that prices have tumbled .
